contest-event.event-date:
May 10, 1986 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). The Wand of Youth [arr. Gay] Radisson Blu Edwardian Manchester Hotel, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 4:40 p.m. March 3, 2012, 9:54 p.m. 1 Lewington Yamaha Denis Carr 2 Solent Concert Band Wesley Garner 3 Newham Band Melvin White 4 Rockingham Band Graham O'Connor 5 Stalybridge Old Band Trevor Walmsley 21 City of Coventry Brass Band Leonard Pepper Unknown Result Oxford Concert Brass Adrian Leaper Unknown Result St. Austell Town Band Kenneth Dennison Unknown Result Barrow Shipyard Band William Maginn Unknown Result Blackburn and Darwen Band Gordon Clough Unknown Result Ibstock Brick Brass Phil Lewsey Unknown Result Flowers Band Mike Cotter Unknown Result Hammonds Saltaire A.
